text:
Use this repository to host a website for your CASA0025 final project by following these stpes:

clone this repository
install quarto
edit the ‘index.qmd’ file with the contents of your project
using terminal, navigate to the project directory and run “quarto render”
push the changes to your github repository
on github, navigate to Settings>Pages>Build and Deployment. Make sure that under “Source” it says “deploy from branch”. Under “Branch”, select “Main” in the first dropdown and “Docs” under the second drop down. Then press “Save”

Your website should now be available under https://{your_username}.github.io/{your_repo_name}

title: Central European Flood 2021: Interactive Analysis of the Moselle River Region Impact
CASA00025 Group Project Title Here
text:
Fill in the sections below to provide a brief summary of your project. Each section should have no more than 100 words. Do not edit any of the headings！


What is the problem you’re trying to address using this application?



Who are you building this application for? How does it address a need this community has?



What data are you using?



How are you using this data to address the problem?



How does your application’s interface work to address the needs of your end user?
